menu.intro: Select an option above to continue

scanQR.followInstruction: Scan QR code with below instruction

roomAvail.message: Please select the arrival date and departure date to display available rooms.
roomAvail.dateInstruction: Please select the arrival date and departure date to search available rooms

step.2: Step 2: Choose the number of guests
step.4: Step 4: Select number of rooms & floors

scanIdCard.successText: Successfully detected. Tap 'Continue' to go to the next step, or tap 'Other Document' to redo the step.
scanIdCard.idCardInstruction: Scan ID Card with below instruction

flowDetect.docIntro: Please choose one of document types below
flowDetect.docInstruction: Choose one of the documents below for the scanner get information
flowDetect.frontIntro: Place the front of the document down on the scanner
flowDetect.frontInstruction: After that, please wait one to two seconds for the device to scan
flowDetect.backIntro: Place the back of the document on the scanner
flowDetect.backInstruction: After that, please wait one to two seconds for the device to scan
flowDetect.faceInstruction: Look directly at the device's camera and then press the 'Take a photo' button, then press the 'Verify' button and wait 1-2 seconds for the device to recognize
flowDetect.plsResume: Please press 'Undo' to take the photo again

serviceText.checkin: You have successfully checked in. Please use the room card and use the hotel facilities.
serviceText.book: You have successfully booked. Please use the room card and use the hotel facilities.

bookingDone.thankText: Thank you for using our service.

text.2: Please press the 'Retry' button to re-register the information, make sure all information is correct.

bookingError.goToReception: Vui lòng liên hệ lễ tân để lấy thẻ phòng.
bookingError.thankText: Thank you for using our service.

msg.errorScanFront: There was an error processing the front of the card. Please perform the operation again.
msg.successScanFace: Successful identification. Select 'Continue' to go to the next screen or select 'Use another document' to redo the operation.
msg.errorScanFace: Error in detection. Please perform the operation again.
msg.notDetected: Face mismatch. Please perform the operation again.
msg.errorSearchBooking: Something went wrong during the search
msg.notFoundBooking: The system did not find the reservation code. Please check your reservation number again
msg.notSelectOption: Please select an option to continue
msg.noOutputVideoDevice: You have no output video device
msg.notHaveFrontImage: The system has not yet scanned the front of the document. Make sure you placed the front of the document into the scanner.
msg.errorGetTotalRate: There was an error retrieving payment information
msg.errorCheckin: There was an error while performing check-in
msg.noFaceImageToDetect: You have not taken a photo to identify
msg.plsSelectBothFromAndToDate: Please select both arrival and departure dates to display available rooms
msg.noSuitableRooms: There are no available rooms that match your search criteria
msg.errorCheckinValidate: Not possible to check-in to this room
msg.errorGuestNoValidate: Invalid number of adults or children.
msg.errorCreateBooking: Something went wrong when booking a room.
msg.errorRoomNotReady: This room is not ready yet. Please contact reception for assistance.
